TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceConfig extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定并配置在调用 或创建 时进入的域中将处于活动状态的服务。

span.span: Specifies and configures the services that are to be active in the domain which is entered when calling or creating an .

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 允许你使用配置的服务，而 不需要将这些服务与组件关联。 and allow you to use the services configured by with no need to tie those services to a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并设置属性来配置所需服务。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the properties to configure the desired services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Binding`|| |`BringYourOwnTransaction`|`null`| |`COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`IISIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`Inheritance`|| |`IsolationLevel`|| |`PartitionId`|零 GUID。A zero GUID.| |`PartitionOption`|| |`SxsDirectory`|`null`| |`SxsName`|`null`| |`SxsOption`|| |`Synchronization`|| |`ThreadPool`|| |`TipUrl`|`null`| |`TrackingAppName`|`null`| |`TrackingComponentName`|`null`| |`TrackingEnabled`|`false`| |`Transaction`|| |`TransactionDescription`|`null`| |`TransactionTimeout`|系统默认值The system default|

span.span: is not supported on the current platform.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::EnterpriseServices::BindingOption Binding { System::EnterpriseServices::BindingOption get(); void set(System::EnterpriseServices::BindingOption value); };
member this.Binding : System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置绑定选项，该选项指示是否将该活动提交的所有工作仅绑定到一个单线程单元 (STA)。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding option, which indicates whether all work submitted by the activity is to be bound to only one single-threaded apartment (STA).
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会影响多线程单元 (MTA) 。 has no impact on the multithreaded apartment (MTA). 此属性仅在创建时用于设置线程池绑定 。This property is used to set the thread pool binding only when creating a . 如果在调用时尝试设置线程池绑定，则会返回错误 。An error is returned if an attempt is made to set the thread pool binding when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Transactions::Transaction ^ BringYourOwnSystemTransaction { System::Transactions::Transaction ^ get(); void set(System::Transactions::Transaction ^ value); };
member this.BringYourOwnSystemTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它表示一个为运行 标识的事务而提供设置的现有事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by .
A .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks (BYOT) 标识提供事务上下文的事务 。 (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the transaction. 自带事务时，该事务的设置将覆盖对象中的其他事务设置 。When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the object. 的默认值为 `null`。The default value for is `null`. 有关 BYOT 的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on BYOT, see .

member this.BringYourOwnTransaction : System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它表示一个为运行 标识的事务而提供设置的现有事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by .
An .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks (BYOT) 标识提供事务上下文的事务 。 (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the transaction. 自带事务时，该事务的设置将覆盖对象中的其他事务设置 。When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the object. 的默认值为 `null`。The default value for is `null`. 有关 BYOT 的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on BYOT, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 COM 事务集成器 (COMTI) 内部对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) intrinsics are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用 COMTI intrinsics 对象，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if COMTI intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用将上下文属性从 COMTI 传递到此类的上下文中。Enables passing context properties from the COMTI into the context for this class. COMTI 简化了将大型机事务和业务逻辑包装为 COM 组件的任务。The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components. 为完成的工作配置 COMTI 内部函数。Configures the COMTI intrinsics for the work that is done. COMTI 简化了用事务包装大型机事务和业务逻辑的任务。The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic with transactions.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IISIntrinsicsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IISIntrinsicsEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 内部对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Internet Information Services (IIS) intrinsics are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用 IIS intrinsics，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if IIS intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许将 IIS 上下文属性（例如应用程序会话对象或用户会话对象）传递到此类的上下文中。Enables passing IIS context properties, such as an application session object or a user session object, into the context for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::EnterpriseServices::InheritanceOption Inheritance { System::EnterpriseServices::InheritanceOption get(); void set(System::EnterpriseServices::InheritanceOption value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是基于当前上下文构造新的上下文，还是仅基于 中的信息创建新的上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to construct a new context based on the current context or to create a new context based solely on the information in .
One of the values.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionIsolationLevel IsolationLevel { System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionIsolationLevel get(); void set(System::EnterpriseServices::TransactionIsolationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置事务的隔离级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the isolation level of the transaction.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果封闭事务未在指定的隔离级别运行，则将创建一个新事务。A new transaction is created if the enclosing transaction is not running at the specified isolation level. 如果包含的代码不会在事务中运行，则将被忽略。 is ignored if the enclosed code would not otherwise run in a transaction.

The default is a zero GUID.

The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置事务 Internet 协议 (TIP) URL，该 URL 允许在现有事务中运行被包含的代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) URL that allows the enclosed code to run in an existing transaction.
A TIP URL.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性类似， 但允许包含的代码作为 TIP URL 指定的现有事务运行。 is similar to the property but allows the enclosed code to run as an existing transaction that is specified by a TIP URL.

member this.TrackingAppName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个文本字符串，该文本字符串对应于报告跟踪程序信息时使用的应用程序 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets a text string that corresponds to the application ID under which tracker information is reported.

value.span: 报告跟踪程序信息时使用的应用程序 ID。

span.span: The application ID under which tracker information is reported.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于没有与此跟踪器属性相关联的组件，因此会报告跟踪器活动是由指定名称的组件引起的 。Because no component is associated with this tracker property, tracker activity is reported as arising from a component with the name specified by . 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

value.span: 报告跟踪程序信息时使用的上下文名称。

span.span: The context name under which tracker information is reported.
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrackingEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TrackingEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用跟踪。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether tracking is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用跟踪，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if tracking is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪器是一种报表机制，可通过监视应用程序来监视正在运行的 COM + 组件。The tracker is a reporting mechanism used by monitoring applications to watch running COM+ components. 它是 "组件服务" 管理工具中旋转组件图标后面的报告机制。It is the reporting mechanism behind the spinning component icons in the Component Services administrative tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未提供说明，则使用的值 来描述事务。If a description if not provided, the value of is used to describe the transaction.
